Representative
Convergys – Intuit QuickBooks Account

As technical support for QuickBooks, my work involved the identification of the root cause of the customer's issue which could fall under software error or user error. User errors, which take up the bulk of the issues encountered within the day, means the customer erroneously entered a transaction within QuickBooks which could be determined with the use of the knowledge and understanding of several key QuickBooks financial reports. All of this while ensuring that the customers have the tools and knowledge they need to run their business.

About Me

Bio

Hi, my name is Zenith Manuel. An experienced Accounting Assistant and a self taught Front-End Web Developer who knows how to create, design and modify web content. Though my work experiences are not directly related to Web Development, I have gained the capacity to adapt and work with minimal supervision. I am a tech enthusiast by nature which makes learning technical skills fun for me.

Technical Knowledge: HTML5, CSS3, Vanilla Javascript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Sass, PHP, React.js, React Native
